summary: MY 2012 GMC TERRAIN HAS BEEN STALLING FOR A FEW DAYS NOW THE STABILLTRACK SENSOR WAS REPLACED THIS YEAR THE ENGINE LIGHT COMES ON AND OFF. AND MY RADIO SOMETIMES CUTS OFF ON IT'S OWN BUT NOW MY KEY KEEPS GETTING STUCK IN THE IGNITION SWITCH AND THE CAR KEEPS STALLING BUT WHEN I GET A JUMP IT STARTS WITH NO PROBLEM BUT ONCE IT STALLED WHEN I WAS DRIVING THANK GOD I WAS A FEW BLOCKS FROM HOME . THEN WHEN I TRY TO START AGAIN IT WON'T START. IT'S ONLY 5YRS. OLD I'VE READ MANY COMPLAINTS ABOUT THIS MODLE. I THINK I BOUGHT A LEMON 😕
